org.apache.gora.mongodb.filters

Class MongoFilterUtil<K,T extends PersistentBase>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gora.mongodb.filters.MongoFilterUtil<K,T>

  • public class MongoFilterUtil<K,T extends PersistentBase>
extends Object
    Manage creation of filtering Query using configured factories.

    You can use "gora.mongodb.filter.factories" parameter to change factories implementations used.

    Author:
    Damien Raude-Morvan
    See Also:
    setFilter(com.mongodb.DBObject, org.apache.gora.filter.Filter, org.apache.gora.mongodb.store.MongoStore)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String MONGO_FILTER_FACTORIES_PARAMETER
      Configuration parameter which allow override of FilterFactory used.
      static String MONGO_FILTERS_DEFAULT_FACTORY
      Default implementation class for FilterFactory.

    • Method Detail

      • getFactory

        public FilterFactory<K,T> getFactory(Filter<K,T> filter)

      • setFilter

        public boolean setFilter(com.mongodb.DBObject query,
                Filter<K,T> filter,
                MongoStore<K,T> store)
        Set a filter on the query. It translates a Gora filter to a MongoDB filter.
        Parameters:
        query - The Mongo Query
        filter - The Gora filter.
        store - The MongoStore.
        Returns:
        if remote filter is successfully applied.
